name: SacksyThyme Microwave Heating Pad for Cramps, Back, Neck, Shoulders, Leg Pain - Reusable Heat Pack, Hot Moist Microwavable Therapy Pack - Unscented Flaxseed Hot Compress Made in USA (Size: 12" x 7")
short_description: 100% Cotton and Fleece

SOOTHING HEAT IN MINUTES: Designed specifically to target cramps, our heating pad is the ideal choice for easing back, neck, menstrual or muscle cramps, leg & shoulder pain. Simply heat it in the microwave for two minutes, and enjoy a blissful 20-30 minutes of moist heat per use. It's a convenient and effective alternative to traditional remedies.

EXCELLENT QUALITY: Our heating pad offers the flexibility of being unscented, catering to those who prefer a fragrance-free experience. It contains no essential oils or herbal solutions. However, if you desire an aromatherapy effect, you can easily add your favorite essential oil to the pad before microwaving. Additionally, the pad is made from 100% natural flaxseed, providing a soft and comforting texture that promotes relaxation.

SOOTHING PAIN: Whether you're dealing with muscle pain due to overexertion from exercise or the strain of working too hard, our versatile heating pads provide the perfect solution. With their ability to deliver comforting warmth, they serve as an effective warm compress, offering relief whenever and wherever you need it. Additionally, if you prefer cold therapy for injuries, bruises, or swelling, simply throw our cooling pad in your freezer. It's perfect for joints, muscles, and cramps!

HOW TO USE: Warm the pad in the microwave for 90 seconds while monitoring the temperature for desired heat. Prevent overheating by ensuring not to exceed 2 minutes per session. Allow the pad to cool down entirely before reheating. Before applying it to the body, check for any hot spots. If you prefer cold therapy for injuries, bruises, or swelling, just place our cooling pad in the freezer prior to use. It works wonders for joints, muscles, and cramps!

WEIGHT AND COMFORT: Carefully crafted with dimensions of approximately 12" wide x 7" long and a weight of approximately 2.2 lbs, this exceptional pad is the perfect balance between size and weight. Contrary to the notion of traditional lightweight products, our heating pad offers a comforting density that aids in stress relief. Proudly Made in the USA, our commitment to quality extends beyond design, ensuring an unmatched experience of both convenience and effectiveness.
